Name: Celts
Exhaust Effect: Exhaust: when you acquire Uncivilised or break through for Uncivlised, exhaust this card. Each other player takes Unrest.

Name: Celtic Gold
Play Effect: Each other player gains 1 Materials. Gain 4 Materials per Grain in your play area.

Name: Celtic Innovation
Play Effect: You MAY acquire Uncivilised/Civilised. Each other player takes Unrest.

Name: Chainmail
Passive Effect: Passive: when you play an Attack, gain 1 Progress.

Name: Chariots
Passive Effect: Passive: you may acquire exiled Regions. Your Conquer and Attack cards lose the Barbarian icon.

Name: Ogham Script
Passive Effect: Passive: increase your hand size by 1. Exhaust: you MAY put a card from your hand into your history. You MAY put a card from your discard pile into your history.

Name: Vercingetorix
Play Effect: You MAY acquire Uncivilised/Civilised. Put this card into your history.

Name: Armorica
Play Effect: You MAY garrison a card.

Name: Belgica
Play Effect: You MAY draw a card. You MAY garrison a card.

Name: Britannia
Play Effect: You MAY garrison a card.

Name: Hibernia
Play Effect: You MAY draw a card from your discard pile. You MAY garrison a card.

Name: Unrest
Play Effect: Choose: Pay 1 Pop OR discard 2 cards OR pay 3 Materials. If you do, return this card to the unrest pile.

Name: Conquer
Play Effect: Choose: pay 2 Pop to acquire Region/Tributary OR pay 3 Pop to break through for Region/Tributary.

Name: Druids
Play Effect: Choose: gain 1 Progress OR pay 1 Pop to break through for Uncivilised OR return an Unrest to gain 1 Pop

Name: Glory
Play Effect: This card cannot be garrisoned. Abandon 3 Region cards to look at the top 2 cards of the Fame deck. Take one of those cards.

Name: Advance
Play Effect: Choose: pay 3 Materials to acquire Uncivilised/Civilised OR pay 5 Materials to break through for Civilised/Uncivilised.

Name: Conquer
Play Effect: Choose: pay 2 Pop to acquire Region/Tributary OR pay 3 Pop to break through for Region/Tributary.

Name: Boudicca
Play Effect: Gain 1 Progress. Each other player abandons a Region. Put this card into your history.

Name: Cattle Raid
Play Effect: Gain 2 Materials. Steal 1 Materials from each player with at least one Region in play. Steal 1 Progress from each Empire player.

Name: Cauldron of Cerridwen
Exhaust Effect: Exhaust: Pay 1 Progress to gain 2 Materials.

Name: Celtica
Play Effect: You MAY place a card of your choice from your discard pile on top of your deck. You MAY garrison a card.

Name: Unrest
Play Effect: Choose: Pay 1 Pop OR discard 2 cards OR pay 3 Materials. If you do, return this card to the unrest pile.
